extent.measure: About three and a quarter megabytes

objectDesc.note: A Cyfnerth text but not bearing a close relation to other texts of that redaction. Includes Damweiniau I at the end.

fileDesc.editionStmt: Bespoke encoding of text drawn from Luft, Peter and Smith (2013), ‘Rhyddiaith gymraeg 1300-1425’.URL:http://www.rhyddiaithganoloesol.caerdydd.ac.uk.

teiHeader.profileDesc: This encoding represents the text of Cyfraith Hywel referred to as U in the Cyfnerth redaction.
